Row.Text: +1[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence to all Resources in the city. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a Salt Resource.

Exposed in salt mines, rocksalt and mudrock form a two component tectonite: The rock type “haselgebirge” consists of 10–70 wt % halite with silt- to gravel- or block-sized components within a halite matrix, and the “kerngebirge” with >70 wt % halite.
